bibl.title: Minima Marcianea. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: The evident analogy between P. Artemid. col. IV, 18-24 and Marcian. Per. mar. ext. 2, 6 (p. 544, 2-4 Müller) is best explained by assuming that Marcianus had Artemidorus' text in front of him while writing the entire section 2, 2 - 2, 7 of his Periplus, and especially in parr. 2, 6-7, dealing with the general shape of Iberia.
PONTANI Filippomaria, Minima Marcianea. Avec résumé en anglais.
